successes.title: Lumos - A Next Generation Bicycle Helmet
successes.description: The ultimate bicycle helmet with brake lights and turn signals to help cyclists stay safe and visible on the road.  |                                                   |Missed our campaign?

Pledges.description: THANKS FOREVER: Your help at any level brings LUMOS one step closer to becoming real. For backers at  ALL levels, your name will be on our wall as a permanent fixture of thanks and gratitude.

DRIVER SUPPORTER: Want to support LUMOS but don't cycle? We still want you to be a part of this! You'll receive an awesome car decal of a bicycle to show off on your car (and identify yourself as a supporter and a friend to cycling). You'll also receive blow-by-blow updates as we bring LUMOS to life.
LUMOS SUPER EARLY BIRD: You've been following us for months now and we want to thank and reward you for your support!

For you our special friends, get one LUMOS helmet complete with integrated lights, motion sensors, and wireless handlebar remote at nearly 50% off the projected price at retail! You will also get all of our updates as we bring LUMOS to life. (add $15 for shipping)
LUMOS EARLY BIRD: You're here early! Get one LUMOS helmet complete with integrated lights, motion sensors, and wireless handlebar remote at a huge 40% off the projected price at retail!

Limited quantities available at this price and delivery schedule. Once the early bird units run out, prices will go up! You will also get all our updates as we bring LUMOS to life. (add $15 for shipping)

LUMOS HELMET KICKSTARTER SPECIAL: We’ve been overwhelmed by the response from the backer community! To celebrate our passing the $500K mark, we’ve decided to extend our $99 pricing for the rest of our campaign! Get one LUMOS helmet complete with integrated lights, motion sensors, and wireless handlebar remote at a huge 40% off the projected price at retail! (add $15 for shipping)

LUMOS HELMET KICKSTARTER SPECIAL: We’ve been overwhelmed by the response from the backer community! To celebrate our passing the $500K mark, we’ve decided to extend our $99 pricing for the rest of our campaign! Get one LUMOS helmet complete with integrated lights, motion sensors, and wireless handlebar remote at a huge 40% off the projected price at retail! (add $15 for shipping)
LUMOS HELMET: Get one LUMOS helmet complete with integrated lights, motion sensors, and wireless handlebar remote at nearly 30% off the projected price at retail!
You will also get all our updates as we bring LUMOS to life. (add $15 for shipping)
DOUBLE LUMOS: Get TWO LUMOS helmets complete with integrated lights, motion sensors, and wireless handlebar remote at over 40% off the projected price at retail!
You will also get all our updates as we bring LUMOS to life. (add $25 for shipping)
LUMOS WITH CUSTOM CALLSIGN: Remember Top Gun? Pete "Maverick" Mitchell. Nick "Goose" Bradshaw.

Those guys were badasses, and you can be one too. Get ONE LUMOS helmet branded with your own name and callsign of your choice. (Need ideas for a good callsign? Internets got your back. Check out: http://www.topgunday.com/call-sign-generator/)
